author: Eliza Mackintosh, CNN
title: What you need to know about coronavirus on Friday, March 27
description: The United States is now the epicenter of a shifting global pandemic. With more than 82,000 confirmed coronavirus cases, it has surpassed China, Spain and Italy, the hardest-hit countries to date.
content:
A version of this story appeared in the March 27 edition of CNN's Coronavirus: Fact vs. Fiction newsletter. Sign up here to receive the need-to-know headlines every weekday.
